snippet.title: Potions: A Curious Tale - Demo Releases Sept. 28
snippet.description:
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/378690/Potions_A_Curious_Tale/

Potions: A Curious Tale is an adventure-crafting game where your wits are your greatest weapons and combat is not always the answer. Encounter fairy tale characters and stories from around the world as you play as Luna, a young witch who brews potions to conquer devious puzzles, outsmart monsters, and gather rare ingredients from these enchanted lands.

Join our Discord at: https://discord.gg/QS2SN55CC4
